MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the EH44 postcode area of Innerleithen is still ongoing. This is due to on site delays and we now expect power to be back on by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:17pm on the 21st of October 2020.
